text.section:
This subtitle does not apply to:
an employee of the Baltimore City Jail as of June 30, 1991, who:
became an employee of the Baltimore City Detention Center on July 1, 1991; and
did not elect to become a member of the Correctional Officers' Retirement System on that date; or
a detention center officer employed by a participating governmental unit as a local detention center officer on the effective date of participation on or after July 1, 2006, who did not elect to become a member of the Correctional Officers' Retirement System within 6 months of the effective date of participation.
